name: ScoreCard for everyone
description:
ScoreCard helps you to easily keep score for every card game, board game, golf and any other game where, since yesterday, you needed scraps of papers, pencils, keep in mind various scores for each player during a match.

Keep every match, player, turn, score with ScoreCard. Manage games with your friends, check who's taking the lead every time, and don't worry to multiply number in your head.

The perfect app always with you, keep score in every game with turns or sessions.
